analyzed: 'bum phrag nas brtsams nas ji srid mthar thug pa med pas bcom ldan 'das ma mngon du bya ba'o //
translated: Beginning from one hundred thousand, one should visualize the BhagavatÄ« until one reaches the ultimate.

original: de nas 'ga' zhig dbang du byed par 'dod pas bzlas pa 'bum phrag byas shing ji skad du bshad pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas te /
analyzed: de nas 'ga' zhig dbang du byed par 'dod pas bzlas pa 'bum phrag byas shing ji skad du bshad pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas te /
translated: Then, if one wishes to enthrall someone, one should recite one hundred thousand times, abiding in the yoga as previously explained.

original: gus pas rab tu 'dud par byed pa'i lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i dbus su gnas pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus kyi 'od zer gyis drangs pa'i bsgrub bya mdun du legs par bzhag la /
analyzed: gus pas rab tu 'dud par byed pa'i lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i dbus su gnas pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus kyi 'od zer gyis drangs pa'i bsgrub bya mdun du legs par bzhag la /
translated: In the midst of gods, demigods, and so on, who are bowing down with devotion, one should visualize the one to be enthralled, drawn forth by the light rays from one's own body.

original: rang gi snying gar autpala dmar po 'dab ma bcu drug pa de'i snying la yang rnam par bsams te /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar autpala dmar po 'dab ma bcu drug pa de'i snying la yang rnam par bsams te /
translated: In one's heart one should visualize a sixteen-petaled red lotus, and in its center one should visualize a hook.

original: 'phags pa rdo rje lus med las bshad pa'i rim pa ltar byung ba dang lcags kyu bsgoms pas de'i ming gi yi ge rang gi snying ga'i sngags kyis dang por kun nas mnan nas /
analyzed: 'phags pa rdo rje lus med las bshad pa'i rim pa ltar byung ba dang lcags kyu bsgoms pas de'i ming gi yi ge rang gi snying ga'i sngags kyis dang por kun nas mnan nas /
translated: As explained in the Vajra-Amogha, one should visualize the hook arising from the mantra in one's heart, and first pressing down on the name syllable of the one to be enthralled.

original: de bzhin du mdas snying phug cing chags pa chen po mos par gyur pa dang / gzhus rgang pa gnyis dang autpala'i zhags pas kyang ske ba bcings shing kun nas drangs pas rang gi rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du bsgyel bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du mdas snying phug cing chags pa chen po mos par gyur pa dang / gzhus rgang pa gnyis dang autpala'i zhags pas kyang ske ba bcings shing kun nas drangs pas rang gi rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du bsgyel bar bya'o //
translated: With the bow and the two arrows, and also with the noose of blue lotuses, he should be bound and pulled, and he should be thrown down in front of his own feet.

original: gal te skyes pa yin na ni lcags kyus snying phug par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te skyes pa yin na ni lcags kyus snying phug par bya ba'o //
translated: If he is a man, he should be pierced in the heart with the goad.

original: ji ste bud med yin na ni chos 'byung nas so //
analyzed: ji ste bud med yin na ni chos 'byung nas so //
translated: If she is a woman, [the goad] should come out of the bhaga.

original: aom ku ru kulle che ge mo 'am che ge mo yang rung ste kun nas khug cig hr'i: sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //

original: brgya bzlas pas ni tha mal pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs dang / rgyal po dang / blon po yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
